Name: Landmarks, 1727 Amsterdam Avenue – Hill Top Apartments, Manhattan (C 260071 HAM).
Title: Application number C 260071 HAM (1727 Amsterdam Avenue – Hill Top Apartments) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 1727 Amsterdam Avenue (Block 2060, Lot 1), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 9, Council District 7.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings, Resiliency and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
